title: Mien Hua Tien - Cotton Fields - Roosevelt Road
description: 棉花田 is the shop name in Chinese. Address in Chinese is 台北市大安區羅斯福路三段273號之1. Part of a chain of organic and natural food stores that's all vegetarian. See website for all locations. Sells organic food products, brewer's yeast, teas, and many other health items. Has packaged all vegetarian food (like a deli) for dinner, and an organic set lunch for around NT$120 daily 11:30am-1:30pm. No seating.
